word: ONE SUCH SCENE WHICH WAS PRESENTED TO HER ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS WAS THAT OF THE DELIVERANCE OF THE SAINTS JUST BEFORE THE SECOND COMING OF CHRIST. AN EARLY PRESENTATION OF THIS IS FOUND IN EARLY WRITINGS, PAGES 285-288, AND IT IS PRESENTED AGAIN IN THE FAMILIAR CHAPTER IN GREAT CONTROVERSY, PAGES 635-652, UNDER THE TITLE OF "GOD'S PEOPLE DELIVERED."
